overview: A warmhearted memorial to the folk singer whose songs galvanized organizers and guitar-pickers across the United States. Part biography, part travelogue and part hootenanny, it follows the singer's son, Arlo Guthrie, as he retraces his father's steps and collects reminiscences from his father's family, friends and musical partners.
tagline: The incredible journey of America's Songwriter and Folk Hero, with Incredible Performances by some of our Greatest Folk Singers
title: Woody Guthrie: Hard Travelin'
